name: Professor Edward: The Gaslick Terrors
description:
Professor Edward: The Gaslick Terrors!

Professor Edward Amon is born in 1921.  The scientist is living peaceful life in Scotland with his inventions and work until one day everything goes terribly wrong : the furious Biters attack and try to destroy the world.

Edward is the smartest scientist on the planet and chose to fight : his weapon of choice, the Gaslick terror, super dangerous and developed under super secret circumstances in his underground laboratory. 

        Now it's time to take action  and fight for the every creatures right to live!

Help  brave Edward with his secret weapon before it's too late to save the world....!
